title: Crave: Part One
description: Kason and Adaline.From the moment they meet, they start to fall. Neither of them predict just how far the drop will be, though.Loving Adaline is all Kason has ever wanted to do. But Kason has a secret.He's an addict.A sex addict.Layer by layer, he starts to unravel, forcing Adaline to face the world he's kept hidden.What happens when one person loves beyond the craving and the other craves beyond the loving?
author: E.K. Blair
